name: Hồ Gươm - trái tim của Thủ đô
description: Hồ Gươm, also known as Sword Lake, is the heart of Hanoi and is famous for its historic significance and scenic beauty.

name: Lăng Chủ tịch Hồ Chí Minh
description: The Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum is the final resting place of Vietnam's revolutionary leader, Ho Chi Minh.

name: Grand World
description: Grand World is a luxury entertainment and shopping complex in Hanoi, offering a range of attractions and experiences.

name: Nhà thờ Lớn Hà Nội
address: Ngô Quyền, Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Vietnam
description: St. Joseph's Cathedral is an iconic Gothic-style church located in the heart of Hanoi, with beautiful stained glass windows.

name: Các bảo tàng tại Hà Nội
description: Hanoi is home to several museums showcasing the city's rich history and culture, including the Vietnam Museum of History and the Museum of Fine Arts.

name: Nhà tù Hoả Lò
address: 1 Hoả Lò, Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Vietnam
description: Hoa Lo Prison is a historic site, once used by French colonial authorities to imprison Vietnamese revolutionaries and later used by the North Vietnamese during the war.

name: Phố cổ Hà Nội - khám phá 36 phố phường
description: Hanoi's Old Quarter is known for its charming streets, colonial architecture, and bustling markets, offering a glimpse into the city's past.

name: Hồ Tây - địa điểm du lịch Hà Nội hấp dẫn
description: West Lake is Hanoi's largest lake, known for its beautiful scenery, tranquil atmosphere, and popular spots for dining and leisure.

name: Chùa Trấn Quốc
address: Đường Thanh Niên, Tây Hồ, Hà Nội, Vietnam
description: Tran Quoc Pagoda is one of the oldest Buddhist temples in Vietnam, located on the shores of West Lake.

name: Văn Miếu Quốc Tử Giám
address: 58 Quốc Tử Giám, Đống Đa, Hà Nội, Vietnam
description: The Temple of Literature is an iconic Confucian temple and the site of the first university in Vietnam.

name: Hoàng thành Thăng Long
address: Hoàng Diệu, Ba Đình, Hà Nội, Vietnam
description: The Thang Long Imperial Citadel is a UNESCO World Heritage site, showcasing the rich history of Hanoi from the Ly Dynasty to the Nguyen Dynasty.

name: Phố Tây Tạ Hiện
address: Tạ Hiện, Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Vietnam
description: Tạ Hiện Street is known for its lively atmosphere, popular bars, and vibrant nightlife, attracting both locals and tourists.

name: Chùa Một Cột
address: Chùa Một Cột, Ba Đình, Hà Nội, Vietnam
description: One Pillar Pagoda is a historic Buddhist temple, known for its unique architecture and connection to Vietnamese culture.

name: Con đường gốm sứ
description: The Ceramic Road is a beautiful street art project showcasing the history and culture of Vietnam through vibrant ceramic murals.

name: Cầu Long Biên - chứng nhân lịch sử
description: Long Bien Bridge is an iconic historical bridge that witnessed the French colonial period and the Vietnam War.

name: Chill tại các quán cafe đẹp Hà Nội
description: Hanoi is known for its charming cafes, offering a relaxing atmosphere to enjoy a cup of Vietnamese coffee.

name: Khu vui chơi giải trí tại Times City
description: Times City is a modern entertainment complex with shopping malls, cinemas, and amusement parks.

name: Công viên Thủ Lệ
description: Thu Le Park is a large public park in Hanoi, featuring a zoo, lakes, and beautiful landscapes.

name: Công viên nước hồ Tây
description: West Lake Water Park is a fun-filled park with water slides, pools, and attractions for all ages.

name: Làng cổ Đường Lâm
address: Đường Lâm, Sơn Tây, Hà Nội, Vietnam
description: Duong Lam Ancient Village is a traditional Vietnamese village that retains its original architecture and culture.

name: Làng nghề gốm Bát Tràng
address: Bát Tràng, Gia Lâm, Hà Nội, Vietnam
description: Bat Trang Ceramic Village is famous for its pottery and traditional ceramics production.

name: Vườn quốc gia Ba Vì
description: Ba Vi National Park is a natural reserve located just outside Hanoi, offering scenic views and outdoor activities.

name: Làng văn hoá các dân tộc
address: Đồng Mô, Sơn Tây, Hà Nội, Vietnam
description: The Ethnic Culture Village showcases the traditions and cultures of various ethnic groups in Vietnam.

name: Việt Phủ Thành Chương
description: Thành Chương's Viet Phu is a cultural village that reflects the traditional Vietnamese architecture and lifestyle.
